amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $200 million from local law enforcement block grants to crime prevention and model intervention grants programs authorized in the 1994 Crime Contol Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 46 in the Congressional Record of July 25, 1995, to transfer $200 million from local law enforcement block grants to crime prevention and model intervention grants programs authorized in the 1994 Crime Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fields (LA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 296 (Roll no. 575).
